description: This Java source file defines a service class 'CategoryService' within a Spring framework application, providing methods for listing all categories and retrieving a category by its ID.

classes.name: CategoryService
classes.description: A service component for handling business logic related to categories in the recipe backend.

methods.name: listAll
methods.description: Returns a list of all Category objects by calling the repository's findAll method.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a Category by its ID, throwing an exception if not found.
